name: Bridge! 2
description: Toxtronyx have now realised their game “Bridge2!” on the powerful Unity engine. Very realistic visuals and lots of new features as well as the possibility to create one’s own levels helped create a completely new game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 or similar Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: min. Intel HD Graphics 4400 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
